name: Dasklo%27irv%27ursimi
content:
Patriarch Dasklo'irv'ursimi  was the leader of the Chiss Dasklo Ruling Family. During the Chiss Ascendancy crisis, in 18 BBY, Clarr Patriarch Clarr'ivl'exow  stated that Kloirvsi would never accept suggestions or alliances from one of the Forty families, and that the alliances with the Dasklo traveled from Kloirvursi outward, as Rivlex had been informed by a Grysk, Jixtus of the Dasklo supposedly forming an alliance with one of the Forty.
Later, Clarr'os'culry  asked Rivlex if the Defense Hierarchy Council had asked the Nine Ruing Families for support in their attempt to prevent a civil war, and Rivlex that stated that not yet, as he speculated that the Council was aware that Kloirvusi would not contribute, and if the Dasklo did not, the Clarr would not either. Kloirvursi later participated in a Circle of Unity in 19 BBY.
Dasklo'irv'ursimi appeared in the 2021 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Lesser Evil, the last volume in Star Wars: The Ascendancy Trilogy by author Timothy Zahn.
